definitions.title: l.
definitions.body: neck, esp. back of neck, of man, wearing chain as ornament Ge 41:42 (E), so of woman Ct So 1:10, cf. Ju Jdg 5:30 (rd. perh. [[חַוׇּארַי]] for [[רֵי]]-), elsewh. in Gn usu. pl. intens., of individual, ´[[נׇפַל עַל־ח]] Ge 45:14 (E), Ge 46:29, Ge 33:4 (Qr; Kt sg.), so ´[[בָּכָה עַל־ח]] Ge 45:14, Ge 46:29 (all J); [[חֶלְקַת חַוַּארָיו]] Ge 27:16 smooth part of neck (J); neck of beautiful woman Ct So 4:4, So 7:5; neck as pressed by foot of conqueror Jos 10:24, Jos 10:24 (JE); place of yoke Ge 27:40 (sg.; J), De 28:48, Is 10:27, Je 27:2, Je 27:8, Je 27:11, Je 27:12, Je 28:10, Je 28:11, Je 28:12, Je 28:14, Je 30:8; of transgressions as yoke La 1:14; place of bonds Is 52:2; of bearing load, Ne 3:5 (fig.), hence calamity as burden Mic 2:3; neck as smitten with sword Ez Eze 21:29; ´[[עַד־ח]] as measurement of height (depth; in fig.) Is 8:8, Is 30:8, Hb Hab 3:13; [[עָתָק]] ´[[בְּח]] fig. Ps 75:6 speak not with arrogant neck (si Vera l.; but rd. perh. [[בַּצּוּר]] against the Rock, LXX. kata\ tou= qeou=, Bae Hup-Now Che Kau); of wicked, rushing against God Job 15:26.—[[עַל־חַוׇּארֵנוּ נִרְêָדּפְנוּ]] La 5:5 is dubious; Matthes Löhr Bae ´[[עׂל עַל־וגו]]; Bu ´[[עׂל חַוּ]], and [[הֲדָפָנוּ]] or [[יֶהְדְּפֵנוּ]] for ´[[נִר]].
neck of animals, camels (wearing ornaments) Ju Jdg 8:21, Jdg 8:26; heifer Ho 10:11 (i. e. place of yoke, in fig. of Ephr.); horse Job 39:19, crocodile Job 41:14.
